blogPost.excerpt: Doppler Share is an easy way to share one-off secrets in a simple end-to-end encrypted way where the links auto-expire after a certain number of views and days.
blogPost.body: Doppler Share is an easy way to share one-off secrets in a simple end-to-end encrypted way where the links auto-expire after a certain number of views and days.
blogPost.title: Doppler Share - Share one-off secrets with end-to-end encryption 🤫
blogPost.author: Michael Seibel

localize.description: 多普勒分享是一种简单的端到端加密分享一次性秘密的方式，链接在一定的浏览量和天数后自动失效。
localize.tagline: 使用端到端加密共享一次性秘密 🤫。

localize.description: 多普勒分享是一種簡單的端到端加密分享一次性祕密的方式，鏈接在一定的瀏覽量和天數後自動失效。
localize.tagline: 使用端到端加密共享一次性祕密 🤫。

previous.excerpt: Acumen is the secret weapon dev teams use to deliver high-quality software on time. The platform unifies and analyzes engineering data to create a high-res picture of the team’s activities and recommends steps to avoid risks and boost productivity.
previous.title: Acumen - GPS for software engineering teams

localize.description: Acumen是开发团队按时交付高质量软件的秘密武器。该平台统一并分析工程数据，以创建团队活动的高分辨率图像，并推荐避免风险和提高生产力的步骤。
Acumen是開發團隊按時交付高質量軟件的祕密武器。該平臺統一併分析工程數據，以創建團隊活動的高分辨率圖像，並推薦避免風險和提高生產力的步驟。

next.excerpt: Directual is the only no-code platform that combines the flexibility, scalability, and security of traditional coding, with a modern, visual development approach. You can build scalable, secure and sophisticated apps with Directual.
next.title: Directual - Power of Coding in No-code format

localize.description: Directual是唯一的无代码平台，它结合了传统编码的灵活性、可扩展性和安全性，以及现代的可视化开发方法。您可以使用Directual构建可扩展、安全和复杂的应用程序。
Directual是唯一的無代碼平臺，它結合了傳統編碼的靈活性、可擴展性和安全性，以及現代的可視化開發方法。您可以使用Directual構建可擴展、安全和複雜的應用程序。
